page.title: 11SPORT
page.content: One of the main sports attractions in the village is Milnrow{Cricket}Club The first team plays in the Trustee Savings Bank Central Lancashire League The club has a total of five teams ranging from a first team to an under thirteen's team. The first team is allowed to play one professional cricketer and the others must be amateurs. The cricket ground is off Harbour Lane and nearby are Milnrow {Bowling}Club and Milnrow{Tennis}Club. There is one bowling green and five tennis courts,three of which are grass In Firgrove there is another Bowling Club and also some public playing fields. There is a nine hole{golf} course at Tunshill Golf Club. In winter an amateur{rugby}league team plays on the field at Roch Valley High School.
